org.sxb.kit.io

クラス AbstractFileResolvingResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractResource
      • org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractFileResolvingResource
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    InputStreamSource, Resource
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    ClassPathResource

    public abstract class AbstractFileResolvingResource
extends AbstractResource
    Abstract base class for resources which resolve URLs into File references, such as UrlResource or ClassPathResource.

    Detects the "file" protocol as well as the JBoss "vfs" protocol in URLs, resolving file system references accordingly.

    導入されたバージョン:
    3.0
    作成者:
    Juergen Hoeller

      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      long contentLength()
      This implementation reads the entire InputStream to calculate the content length.
      boolean exists()
      This implementation checks whether a File can be opened, falling back to whether an InputStream can be opened.
      java.io.File getFile()
      This implementation returns a File reference for the underlying class path resource, provided that it refers to a file in the file system.
      boolean isReadable()
      This implementation always returns true.
      long lastModified()
      This implementation checks the timestamp of the underlying File, if available.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

        public AbstractFileResolvingResource()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This implementation returns a File reference for the underlying class path resource, provided that it refers to a file in the file system.
        定義:
        getFile インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        getFile クラス内 AbstractResource
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the resource cannot be resolved as absolute file path, i.e. if the resource is not available in a file system
        関連項目:
        org.ResourceKits.util.ResourceUtils#getFile(java.net.URL, String)

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractResource
        This implementation checks whether a File can be opened, falling back to whether an InputStream can be opened. This will cover both directories and content resources.
        定義:
        exists インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        exists クラス内 AbstractResource

      • isReadable

        public boolean isReadable()
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractResource
        This implementation always returns true.
        定義:
        isReadable インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        isReadable クラス内 AbstractResource
        関連項目:
        InputStreamSource.getInputStream()

      • contentLength

        public long contentLength()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractResource
        This implementation reads the entire InputStream to calculate the content length. Subclasses will almost always be able to provide a more optimal version of this, e.g. checking a File length.
        定義:
        contentLength インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        contentLength クラス内 AbstractResource
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the resource cannot be resolved (in the file system or as some other known physical resource type)
        関連項目:
        InputStreamSource.getInputStream()

      • lastModified

        public long lastModified()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractResource
        This implementation checks the timestamp of the underlying File, if available.
        定義:
        lastModified インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        lastModified クラス内 AbstractResource
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the resource cannot be resolved (in the file system or as some other known physical resource type)
        関連項目:
        AbstractResource.getFileForLastModifiedCheck()
